'''1.11.2.1''' is a major update for the [[Bedrock Dedicated Server]]s, released on May 2, 2019, that updates the servers for [[Bedrock Edition 1.11.2]].

== Changes ==
'''[[Bedrock Dedicated Server]]s'''
* Updated for 1.11.2 clients.

== Reclient ==
A reclient of this version was released on May 17, 2019 that updates to 1.11.3.

=== Changes ===
'''[[Bedrock Dedicated Server]]s'''
* Updated for 1.11.3 clients.
